name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a frying pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Add garlic to the pancetta and cook for 1 minute.
Drain the spaghetti and add to the pan, removing from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water to create a sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add cream and season with salt.
Garnish with coriander before serving.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and mix with rice vinegar.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat.
Spread sushi rice over nori, leaving a 1-inch border.
Place fish and cucumber in the center.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: Marinate pork with adobo sauce for 1 hour.
Grill the pork until cooked through.
Warm corn tortillas on the grill.
Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: In a skillet, brown the beef slices and remove from pan.
Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir.
Slowly add beef broth and bring to a simmer.
Return beef to the pan and stir in sour cream.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve over egg noodles.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Layer tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between layers.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

name: Biryani
steps: In a pot, sauté onions until golden.
Add meat and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and biryani spice mix.
Add rice and broth, bring to a boil, then simmer covered until rice is cooked.
Garnish with fresh mint and coriander before serving.

name: Moussaka
steps: Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 30 minutes, then rinse.
In a pan, sauté onion and ground beef until browned.
Add tomatoes and tomato paste, simmer for 20 minutes.
Layer eggplant and meat mixture in a baking dish, top with bechamel sauce.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 45 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown. Serve with maple syrup.

name: Fountain of Youth Smoothie
steps: In a blender, combine banana, spinach, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey.
Add frozen berries and chia seeds.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and stir to coat.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Quiche Lorraine
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Place pie crust in a pie dish.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cream.
Spread bacon and cheese in the crust, pour egg mixture over.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, until set.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: In a skillet, brown the beef with onion and garlic.
Add taco seasoning and cook according to package instructions.
Serve in tortillas topped with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss gently and serve.

name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: In a pot, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add pumpkin, cumin, and broth; bring to a boil.
Simmer until pumpkin is tender, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper, serve with a swirl of cream.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season fish with olive oil and chili powder.
Grill or fry the fish until cooked through.
Serve in tortillas with shredded cabbage and lime wedges.

name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Mix butter and garlic, spread on the baguette.
Top with cheese and bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

name: Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, carrots)
steps: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes.

name: Apple Pie
steps: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Place apple mixture in one pie crust, dot with butter, and cover with the second crust.
Cut slits in the top crust and bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Pesto Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Drain and mix with pesto and cherry tomatoes.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Chili Con Carne
steps: In a pot, sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes, beans, and chili powder; simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and serve.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
steps: Soak rice for at least 1 hour, then steam until cooked.
In a saucepan, mix coconut milk, sugar, and a pinch of salt; heat gently.
Serve rice with coconut sauce and mango slices.

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: In a pot, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add vegetables and curry powder, cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and serve.

name: Banana Bread
steps: Preheat the oven to 175°C (350°F).
In a bowl, mix bananas, sugar, and melted butter.
Add eggs and flour, mix until combined.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

name: Coconut Macaroons
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, mix coconut, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, and salt.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes.
